full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAM CAN GYIS BZLOG BSGYUR NI, 'DI LA MANG LA RGYAS PAR 'GYUR RO, 'DI LA BYED NA DMAR PO GTOR MA GCIG SUM BRGYA DRUG CU THEB KYU GZHAN YANG NYER GCIG 'GYUR RO, NANG GDON BAR CHAD BGEGS KYI RIGS SU GYUR BA THAMS CAD BZLOG PAR 'GYUR RO, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA'O, ,)
